divs: Sighting DetailsWe were having a movie night with some friends and I went out on the deck (We reside close to the Blue Ridge Mountains) to smoke a cigarette.As I was looking up to the sky towards the west,I noticed a sphere-like object hovering above in the distance it was lit up and composed of various colors moving slowly towards the west. I proceeded to gather my friends and family to witness the event. They were baffeled by the sight of this also.We were amazed by the sighting,however we had previously seen another object Approx. one year ago,but that one was of a different shape(large triangular shape)so we were not totally shocked,but our friends were shocked because they were non-believers until this incident enlighted them. We lost sight of the object as it continued to slowly head towards the west.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Waynesboro
There were no other sightings in Waynesboro on or around October 6th 2008
